00058     function main($content,$conf)   {
00059         
00060         $this->init($conf);
00061 
00062         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->debugOutput = true;
00063 
00064         if ($this->piVars['submit']) {
00065             $content = $this->doSubmit();
00066         } else {
00067             $content = $this->showForm();
00068         }
00069 
00070         return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00071     }

00079     function init($conf) {
00080         $this->conf=$conf;
00081         $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00082 
00083         $this->tx_init();
00084         $this->tx_loadLL();
00085         
00086         
00087         $this->conf['requiredFields'] = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$this->conf['requiredFields']);
00088         
00089         $this->userID = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->fe_user->user[uid];
00090         
00091         $this->ts = mktime();
00092         
00093         $this->fetchConfigValue('viewmode');
00094 
00095         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('date2cal')) {
00096             $this->JSCalendar = JSCalendar::getInstance();
00097             if (($jsCode = $this->JSCalendar->getMainJS()) != '') {
00098                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['servicemgr_date2cal'] = $jsCode;
00099             }
00100         }
00101     }

00109     function showForm($defaultValues = array()) {
00110         $template = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template, '###ADDNEWEVENT###');
00111 
00112         $this->initDefaultValues($defaultValues);
00113         
00114         
00115         $marker = array(
00116             '###L_DATE###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DATE'),
00117             '###L_TIME###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_TIME'),
00118             '###L_DATETIME###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DATETIME'),
00119             '###L_SUBJECT###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_SUBJECT'),
00120             '###L_SERIES###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_SERIES'),
00121             '###L_PUBLIC###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_PUBLIC'),
00122             '###L_TAGS###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_TAGS'),
00123             '###L_REQUIREDTEAMS###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_REQUIREDTEAMS'),
00124             '###L_DUTYSCHEDULEOPEN###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DUTYSCHEDULEOPEN'),
00125             '###L_DOCUMENTS###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DOCUMENTS'),
00126             '###L_NOTES###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_NOTES'),
00127             '###L_NOTESINTERNAL###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_NOTESINTERNAL'),
00128             '###L_SUBMIT###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_SUBMIT'),
00129         );
00130         
00131         $marker = array_merge(
00132             $marker, array(
00133             '###V_DATE###' => $defaultValues['date'],
00134             '###V_TIME###' => $defaultValues['time'],
00135             '###V_DATETIME###' => $defaultValues['datetime'],
00136             '###V_SUBJECT###' => $defaultValues['subject'],
00137             '###V_PUBLIC###' => $defaultValues['public'] ? 'checked="checked" ' : '',
00138             '###V_DUTYSCHEDULEOPEN###' => $defaultValues['dutyscheduleopen'] ? 'checked="checked" ' : '',
00139             '###V_NOTES###' => $defaultValues['notes'],
00140             '###V_NOTESINTERNAL###' => $defaultValues['notesinternal'],
00141         ));
00142 
00143         
00144         if (is_array($this->formValidationErrors)) {
00145             $formError = $this->pi_getLL('error_missingfields').' ';
00146             foreach ($this->formValidationErrors as $k => $v) {
00147                 $formErrors[] = $this->pi_getLL('L_'.strtoupper($k));
00148             }
00149             $formError .= implode(', ',$formErrors);
00150             $formError = $this->throwErrorMsg($formError);
00151         }
00152         $marker['###FORM_ERRORS###'] = $formError;
00153         
00154         
00155         $marker['###DATE_CAL###'] = $this->getDate2Cal('tx_servicemgr_pi4[date]');
00156         $marker['###TIME_CAL###'] = '';
00157 
00158         
00159         //SERIES
00160         $series = $this->getSeries();
00161         if (!is_array($series)) {
00162             $seriesContent = $this->pi_getLL('error_noseries');
00163         } else {
00164             $seriesContent = '<select name="tx_servicemgr_pi4[series]" id="frm-series">'."\n";
00165             foreach ($series as $serie) {
00166                 $seriesContent .= ' <option value="'.$serie['uid'].'"';
00167                 if ($serie['uid'] == $defaultValues['series'])
00168                     $seriesContent .= ' selected="selected"';
00169                 
00170                 $seriesContent .= '>'.$serie['name'].'</option>'."\n";
00171             }
00172             $seriesContent .= '</select>'."\n";
00173             $seriesAddLink = '<img title="'.$this->pi_getLL('title_addlink_series').'" alt="'.$this->pi_getLL('alt_addlink_series').'" src="'.$this->conf['addlink_img'].'" class="addIcon" />';
00174         }
00175         $marker['###SERIES_SELECTOR###'] = $seriesContent;
00176         $marker['###SERIES_ADDLINK###'] = $seriesAddLink;
00177 
00178         
00179         //TAGS
00180         $tags = $this->getTags();
00181         if (!is_array($series)) {
00182             $tagsContent = $this->pi_getLL('error_notags');
00183         } else {
00184             $defaultValues['tags'] = split(',',$defaultValues['tags']);
00185             foreach ($tags as $tag) {
00186                 $tagsContent .= '<input type="checkbox" name="tx_servicemgr_pi4[tags][]" value="'.$tag['uid'].'" id="frm-tags-'.$tag['uid'].'"';
00187                 if (in_array($tag['uid'], $defaultValues['tags'])) {
00188                     $tagsContent .= ' checked="checked"';
00189                 }
00190                 $tagsContent .= ' /> <label for="frm-tags-'.$tag['uid'].'">'.$tag['name'].'</label><br />';
00191             }
00192         }
00193         $tagsAddLink = '<img title="'.$this->pi_getLL('title_addlink_tags').'" alt="'.$this->pi_getLL('alt_addlink_tags').'" src="'.$this->conf['addlink_img'].'" />';
00194         $marker['###TAGS_CBS###'] = $tagsContent;
00195         $marker['###TAGS_ADDLINK###'] = $tagsAddLink;
00196 
00197         
00198         //TEAMS
00199         $teams = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTgetRows('uid,title',
00200                     'fe_groups', 'deleted=0 AND tx_servicemgr_isteam=1');
00201         if (!is_array($teams)) {
00202             $teamsContent = $this->pi_getLL('error_noteams');
00203         } else {
00204             $defaultValues['requiredteams'] = split(',',$defaultValues['requiredteams']);
00205             foreach ($teams as $team) {
00206                 $teamsContent .= '<input type="checkbox" name="tx_servicemgr_pi4[requiredteams][]" value="'.$team['uid'].'" id="frm-requiredteams-'.$team['uid'].'"';

00208                     $teamsContent .= ' checked="checked"';
00209                 }
00210                 $teamsContent .= ' /> <label for="frm-requiredteams-'.$team['uid'].'">'.$team['title'].'</label><br />';
00211             }
00212         }
00213         $marker['###REQUIREDTEAMS_CBS###'] = $teamsContent;
00214 
00215         
00216         $marker['###DOCUMENTS_ADDLINK###'] = '<img title="'.$this->pi_getLL('title_addlink_documents').'" alt="'.$this->pi_getLL('alt_addlink_documents').'" src="'.$this->conf['addlink_img'].'" />';
00217 
00218         
00219         $actionLink = $this->cObj->typoLink_URL(array(
00220             'parameter' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00221             'addQueryString' => 1,
00222             'addQueryString.' => array(
00223                 'exclude' => 'cHash,no_cache',
00224         ),
00225             'additionalParams' => '&no_cache=1',

00227         ));

00229 
00230         $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template, $marker);

00241     function initDefaultValues(&$data) {
00242         if ($data === array()) {
00243             $data = $this->conf['defaultValues.'];
00244         }
00245         foreach ($data as $k => $v) {
00246                     $data[$k] = is_array($v) ? implode(',',$v) : $v;    
00247         }
00248     }

00256     function getDate2Cal($inputField) {
00257         $content = '';
00258         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('date2cal')) {
00259             $this->JSCalendar->setDateFormat(false);
00260             $this->JSCalendar->setConfigOption('format','%d.%m.%Y');
00261             $this->JSCalendar->setConfigOption('ifFormat','%d.%m.%Y');
00262             $this->JSCalendar->setInputField($inputField);
00263             $content = $this->JSCalendar->renderImages();
00264         }
00265         return $content;
00266     }
00267 
00273     function doSubmit() {
00274         if ($this->piVars['submit'] && $this->doSubmit_validate()) {
00275             $startingPoints[0] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00276             if (!empty($this->cObj->data["pages"])) {
00277                 $startingPoints = explode(',',$this->cObj->data["pages"]);
00278             }
00279             list($date['day'], $date['month'], $date['year']) = split('\.',$this->piVars['date']);
00280             list($time['hour'], $time['minute']) = split(':',$this->piVars['time']);
00281             $datetime = mktime(intval($time['hour']),intval($time['minute']),0,intval($date['month']),intval($date['day']),intval($date['year']));
00282 
00283             $record = array(
00284                 'pid' => $startingPoints[0],
00285                 'datetime' => $datetime,
00286                 'subject' => $this->piVars['subject'],
00287                 'series' => intval($this->piVars['series']),
00288                 'public' => intval($this->piVars['public']),
00289                 'tags' => implode(',',$this->piVars['tags']),
00290                 'requiredteams' => implode(',',$this->piVars['requiredteams']),
00291                 'dutyscheduleopen' => intval($this->piVars['dutyscheduleopen']),
00292                 'notes' => $this->piVars['notes'],
00293                 'notes_internal' => $this->piVars['notes_internal'],
00294             );
00295             $record['l18n_diffsource'] = serialize($record);
00296             $record['tstamp'] = $record['crdate'] = $this->ts;
00297 
00298             $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery('tx_servicemgr_events', $record);
00299             $newUid = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_insert_id();
00300 
00301             $content=$this->detailViewEvent(
00302                 $newUid,
00303                 array(
00304                     'subparts' => array('subject','datetime','series','notes','backlink'),
00305                     'backlink' => array('str' => $this->pi_getLL('back'), 'id' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id),
00306                 ),
00307                 $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->cObj->fileResource('EXT:servicemgr/res/esv.html'), '###SINGLEEVENTEL###')
00308             );
00309         } else {
00310             $content = $this->showForm($this->piVars);
00311         }
00312         return $content;
00313     }
00314 
00320     function doSubmit_validate() {
00321         $result = true;
00322         foreach($this->piVars as $k => $v) {
00323             $this->piVars[$k] = !is_array($v) ? trim($v) : $v;
00324         }
00325 
00326         if (is_array($this->conf['requiredFields'])) {
00327             foreach ($this->conf['requiredFields'] as $field) {
00328                 if (!$this->piVars[$field]) {
00329                     $this->formValidationErrors[$field] = 1;
00330                 }
00331             }
00332         } else {
00333             $result = false;
00334         }
00335 
00336         
00337         $this->piVars['public'] = $this->piVars['public'] == 1 ? 1 : 0;
00338         $this->piVars['dutyscheduleopen'] = $this->piVars['dutyscheduleopen'] == 1 ? 1 : 0;
00339         $this->piVars['tags'] = is_array($this->piVars['tags']) ? $this->piVars['tags'] : array();
00340         $this->piVars['requiredteams'] = is_array($this->piVars['requiredteams']) ? $this->piVars['requiredteams'] : array();
00341 
00342                 
00343         if (@count($this->formValidationErrors) !== 0) {
00344             $result = false;
00345         }
00346         return $result;
00347     }
